sentences.en: AI's ankle - breaking crossover dribble or LeBron's stiff - armed tomahawk jam.
sentences.cn: ai的胯下运球足以让防守方扭断脚脖子,勒布朗挥臂扣篮就像一把战斧一样势不可挡.

sentences.en: Apply a dribble of baby shampoo.
sentences.cn: 抹一点儿婴儿洗发香波。

sentences.en: Blood from the wound dribbled down the side of his face.
sentences.cn: 伤口的血顺着他脸颊流下来。

sentences.en: Dribble the hot mixture slowly into the blender.
sentences.cn: 将热的混合物慢慢滴入食物搅拌器。

sentences.en: Dribble the oil into the beaten egg yolks.
sentences.cn: 往打匀的蛋黄里一滴滴加油.

sentences.en: He was trying to dribble the ball past his opponents.
sentences.cn: 他想带球晃过对方球员。

sentences.en: He wiped a dribble of milk from his chin with a handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 他用手帕擦去淌在下巴上的一点牛奶.

sentences.en: He wiped a dribble of saliva from his chin.
sentences.cn: 他擦掉了下巴上的几滴口水.

sentences.en: His clothes are soaked in dribble.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服被口水浸湿了。

sentences.en: How can I control the ball, shoot or dribble?
sentences.cn: 如何控制球, 投篮或运球?

sentences.en: No.13 The saliva dribble today becomes your tears tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 训言13现在流的口水,将成为明天的眼泪.

sentences.en: Now the ref'splacing the ball forward's dribble.
sentences.cn: 现在,他们的右辅正在盘球前进.

sentences.en: On the morning of the sixth day the dribble of cylinders slowed down.
sentences.cn: 到第六天早晨,纸条慢慢地减少了.

sentences.en: Should you dribble toward your teammates or away from your teammates? Why?
sentences.cn: 应该向同伴运球还是远离同伴运球? 为什么?

sentences.en: The fans expect me always to dribble and take men on.
sentences.cn: 球迷期望我能不停地带球突破.

sentences.en: Then he tried to catch pass and dribble down the court.
sentences.cn: 当他试图去接队友的传球的的时候,球回场了.

sentences.en: There's only a dribble of coffee left, I'm afraid.
sentences.cn: 看来只剩下一点点咖啡了.

words.tran_cn: 运球前进的人；流涎的人

trans.tran_cn: 口水，涓滴，细滴，运球，少量（液体）
trans.tran_en: the act of moving the ball along with you by short kicks,  bounce s  or hits in a game of football,  basketball  etc
if a liquid dribbles somewhere, it flows in a thin irregular stream

trans.tran_cn: （使液体）滴下或作细流，运球，带球
